I am sexually active (only with my boyfriend). I'm worried and the pain is an aching pain in my stomach. I also suffered a serious kidney infection a month ago. The doctor found blood in my urine it was quite sever aswell I was bed ridden for three days. The utrine infection I had recently was unbearableUnlike any I have ever suffered with.
